Read in and parse TOML file as strict list

Source: R/pal.gen.R
toml_read.Rd

Reads in a file in Tom's Obvious Minimal Language (TOML) format and returns its content as a (nested) strict list.

Usage

toml_read(path, verbose = FALSE)

Arguments

path

Path to a TOML file. A character scalar.

verbose

A logical switch to turn on (very) verbose operation which can be useful in debugging a parsing issue in a file.

Value

A strict list.

Details

The file is parsed using RcppTOML::parseTOML(escape = FALSE).

See also

Other TOML functions: toml_validate()
